snippet: Justice is a process, but there can be no hint of bias in the investigations into the shooting in Ferguson, Mo.
abstract: Editorial urges local and federal officials to aggressively pursue justice in case of Michael Brown, unarmed black teenager shot by officer in Ferguson, Mo; suggests that St Louis County prosecuting attorney Robert McCulloch may be biased by past experiences and calls for Gov Jay Nixon to replace him with special prosecutor to examine case.
lead_paragraph: Justice is a process, but there can be no hint of bias in the investigations into the shooting in Ferguson, Mo.

headline.main: A Fair Inquiry for Michael Brown
headline.print_headline: A Fair Inquiry for Michael Brown
